data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Brian was a down on his luck kids football coach, he had to take training the following morning but last week all the kids complained because most of the footballs he had in his bag were flat, but he didn't have a pump to inflate them. He quickly jumped in his car to go to buy a pump, but broke down shortly after setting off because he'd put diesel in his car instead of petrol. He had to call a breakdown service to come and pick him and his car up.
data.original_output: Brian was a down on his luck kids football coach, he had to take training the following morning but last week all the kids complained because most of the footballs he had in his bag were flat, but he didn't have a pump to inflate them. He quickly jumped in his car to go to buy a pump, but broke down shortly after setting off because he'd put diesel in his car instead of petrol. He had to call a breakdown serive to come and pick him and his car up.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Josie was a quiet girl who lived in a small village and had a hobby as a stamp collector. Her dad worked in the local post office so she had access to lots of stamps and loved seeing all the different types on the letters that came through the post office, although she would never use any of her stamp collection on normal letters herself, they were too special to her. When letters would be returned to the post office when a letter couldn't be posted, her father would send the old stamps her way.
data.original_output: Josie was a quiet girl who lived in a small village and had a hobby as a stamp collector. Her dad worked in the local post office so she had access to lots of stamps and loved seeing all the different types on the letters that came though the post office, although she would never use any of her stamp collection on normal letters herself, they were too special to her. When letters would be returned to the post office when a letter couldn't be posted, her father would send the old stamps her way.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: In the British empire, Christianity was an important way in which colonialism spread. The symbol of huge cathedrals and churches with a large organ inside pumping out hymns was very powerful. Many people faced a choice, comply or die.
data.original_output: In the British empire, Christianity was an important way in which colonialism spread. The symbol of huge cathedrals and churches with a large organ inside pumping out hymns was very powerful. Many people faced a choice, comply or die.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: It wasn't all doom and gloom. Matt found many ways to exist without falling in despair. One small payment to a bartender in exchange for a pint of ale was one such way.
data.original_output: It wasn't all doom and gloom. Matt found many ways to exist without falling in despair. One small payment to a bartender in exhchange for a pint of ale was one such way.
